> Project Part: Modular Engine (10/min)
  # Standard: Modular Engine:
    | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
        - 20 Motor(s)
        - 150 Rubber(s)
        - 20 Project Part: Smart Plating(s)
        - 550 MW(s)
        * 10 Manufacturer(s)
        * 3420 m^2(s) (about 54 foundations minus belt space)
        * 2 steps into the chain from the top.
        ++ 10 Project Part: Modular Engine per minute
    |- Motor (20/min)
        # Alternate: Electric Motor:
          | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
              - 10 Electromagnetic Control Rod(s)
              - 20 Rotor(s)
              - 30 MW(s)
              * 2 Assembler(s)
              * 300 m^2(s) (about 5 foundations minus belt space)
              * 4 steps into the chain from the top.
              ++ 20 Motor per minute
          |- Electromagnetic Control Rod (10/min)
              # Alternate: Electromagnetic Connection Rod:
                | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
                    - 10 Stator(s)
                    - 5 High Speed Connector(s)
                    - 15 MW(s)
                    * 1 Assembler(s)
                    * 150 m^2(s) (about 3 foundations minus belt space)
                    * 6 steps into the chain from the top.
                    ++ 10 Electromagnetic Control Rod per minute
